name: Xolo (SergioGG05)
description:
Xolo

Xolo  is a runner where the player takes control of a mythical dog " xoloitzcuintle ", who, as the legend says, guide the lost souls in their way to the great beyond (Mictalan).         

A game made in Mexico by indie studio AzTechnology , for the Game Jam Plus 2022.

#GJ+ #GameJamPlus2022

Credits:

Christianne Ivette Franco Peralta-  2D Artist,  Art Director, Narrative Designer

Christopher Ivan Ortiz Villafañet - Programming, UI Programming, Game testing, VFX Designer

Elliot Johan Reyes Mendoza -  Programming, UI Programming, Game testing, VFX Designer

OCK - Music Composer, Audio Director, Sound Designer

Sergio Gómez Gómez - Game Design, Project Management, Level Design, Creative Director
